Pre-Game Insights: Armenia's latest result ended a four-game losing streak and they will be looking to kick on from that on Saturday.
Latvia saw their latest result end a six-game winless run and will be looking to build on that this weekend.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two sides last faced off in a European Championship qualifying clash last October, which the visitors won 2-0 despite finishing the game with 10 men.
Latvia were ranked 137th in the latest FIFA rankings and now sit 40 places behind their weekend opponents.
Others: The visitors have failed to score any goals in three of their last four games in this fixture.
Latvia are, however, without a win in their last 10 games on foreign grounds and could see defeat here.
